post.body: and @shazbazzar ...then old man winter laughs a hardy laugh and blast you with arctic air!
and @shazbazzar That is what winter is like up here. It stays cold for so long then treats you to a spring day...
It sundown here so Happy Hanukkah!
You're a spring chicken. At least your not 31.
You're a cruel, cruel man. :)
So, your enjoying the nice tropical breezes. While I'm dealing with arctic winds. There are days I hate you! ;)
Good night man! You have more tech on vacation than in my entire house! @mitchellscott I agree wired is the only way!
Are you sure you brought enough technology with you? ;)
wait till you read the "special project" your head will explode!
Going to bed now as the arctic wind sings its cold song. Two more days of tax law then a short vacation of my own.
Getting ready to make sure the car doesn't freeze up so I can travel to work tomorrow morning in 11degree weather! I hate West Virginia!
Of course I also go weird all the way too!
Ah, it was nice having a day away from tax law. I get another day tomorrow! Bliss! :)
I want to thank all the new followers I've picked up recently for the follow.
Never mind.
I can't get back in!
You met another and ppppppfffffffffttttttthhhhhhhhhh!!!!! You were gone!
Oh where, oh where are you tonight? Why did you leave me here all alone? I searched the world over and thought I found true love!
At least we get the show in rerun Friday. :(
Does anyone want to entertain the people?
